Description: Freshworks CRM is an AI-powered platform that enables businesses to get and keep Customers-for-life.
Name: Freshworks CRM

Methods.Name: List Appointments
Methods.Description: Get a list of filtered appointments i.e get your past and upcoming appointments.

Methods.Name: Filtered Search for Accounts
Methods.Description: You can use filtered search to find records that are an exact match to the search query.

Methods.Description: Get a List of All Account Filters.

Methods.Description: You can use filtered search to find records that are an exact match to the search query within the given date range.

Methods.Description: Delete an Account.

Methods.Description: Create an Account.
